A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is a bad movie\, a disjointed mess full of illogical plot and plenty of plotholes\, some sections of the movie could be easily removed and there is little to none character development\,  or questions answered.
It is a VERY bad star wars movie since on top of that it contradicts previous lore\, and characters of the franchise 
And to add a cherry on the top of this shitcake it is plagued by ideological and not so subtle political propaganda.
The story is bad\, the characters are bad and it insults audiences with propaganda\, only tolerable becuase of  very good looking shots and a fight scene
